item.title: 41 Best Labor Day Sales on WIRED-Tested Gear (2025)

review.headline_rewrite: 41 Best Labor Day Sales on WIRED-Tested Gear (2025)
bullets: The unofficial end of summer brings with it bargains on WIRED-tested gear, including home office essentials and some of our favorite gadgets.

- The best iPad: Apple iPad (A16, 2025) for $299 ($50 off)
- The best electric pizza oven: Ooni Volt Electric Pizza Oven for $630 ($270 off)
- Top-notch noise-canceling earbuds: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds for $229 ($70 off)
- Our very favorite chair: Branch Ergonomic Chair Pro for $449 ($50 off)—Use Code LABORDAY
- A great-looking cold plunge pool: Plunge Original Cold Plunge Pool for $7,216 ($1,274 off)
- The best fitness tracker: Fitbit Charge 6 for $125 ($36 off)
Tech Deals
This beefy power bank is our favorite upgrade pick, and this price comes within $10 of the lowest we’ve tracked.
It’s stylish and has nifty features like two built-in USB-C cables and a display that shows remaining battery, temperatures, charging rate, and battery health.
Get more nitty-gritty details in our full review.
And they sound even better than they look, with great controls and EQ customizations available in the app.
The only thing we overtly dislike is the sound quality, but then again, you should have a soundbar anyway.

- Our favorite mattress: Helix Midnight Luxe for $1,751 ($168 Off)—Use Coupon Code WIRED27
- Our favorite for side sleepers: Nolah Evolution for $1,439 ($156 Off)—Use Code WIRED50
- Best for back pain: Bear Elite Hybrid for $1,456 ($243 Off)—With Code WIRED40
- If you prefer organic: Birch Luxe Natural for $1,916 ($183 Off)—Use Coupon Code WIRED27
- Our favorite percale sheets: The Citizenry Stonewashed Organic Cotton Percale Sheet Set for $151 ($38 Off)
The Best Labor Day Mattress Sales
We don't mess around when it comes to sales—we track prices to see where the actual deals are, not just tweaked sales lingo.
The Helix Midnight Luxe is a side sleeper’s dream, mainly because it was made especially for that purpose.
This is good news if you’re a side sleeper or have joint pain and want a more eco-friendly bed.
But back pain isn’t the only reason for getting this type of bed.
But if you want a firm bed to help with your back pain, you have that option as well.
All of Bear's mattresses focus on natural materials, no fiberglass, and plenty of support for pain relief.

item.title: AI warning: 10 things you should never share with ChatGPT and other chatbots

review.headline_rewrite: AI warning: 10 things you should never share with ChatGPT and other chatbots
bullets: Artificial intelligence chatbots like ChatGPT are rapidly changing the way people interact with technology.
From answering quick questions and drafting emails to offering companionship and emotional support, these tools are becoming a daily presence in many lives.
Experts warn that oversharing with AI carries serious risks, including privacy breaches, identity theft, and misuse of personal or sensitive information.
Unlike a human conversation, interactions with AI are not confidential, and what you share may be stored, analysed, or even exposed.

10 things that you should never discuss with AI chatbots
1.

Personal information
Details like your full name, home address, phone number, or email may seem harmless but can be pieced together to track your online identity.

Georgia Schools
AI is changing education.

item.title: Giuliani injured in vehicle accident, security chief says

review.headline_rewrite: Giuliani injured in vehicle accident, security chief says

bullets:
Grammarly launches new AI agents to assist students and professionals with writing tasks
Grammarly has introduced eight new AI agents within its AI writing surface, 'docs,' designed to aid students and professionals with diverse writing tasks.
These agents offer functionalities like citation finding, plagiarism checking, and AI detection, alongside features predicting reader reactions and providing rubric-based feedback.
This launch signifies Grammarly's move towards agent-based AI to enhance writing across various platforms.
